SummaryEnglish: In the future, a man named Sakura is destined to create the technology for eternal life, which (due to Sakura's lolicon tendencies) freezes all women's aging once they turn twelve. God refuses to allow this, so he sends his angels to the past to kill Sakura before he can do this. But one angel, Dokuro-chan, decides to try to change the future without killing him. Problem is, Dokuro is very temperamental, and is constantly killing Sakura (and lots of other people too) in incredibly bloody ways with her giant spiked club. Good thing she can bring people back to life - if only to gruesomely kill them again the next time she loses her temper.

1.TitleEnglish: I'm Club-to-Death Angel! Dokuro-chan! / The Assassin from the Future! Dokuro-chan!
1.SummaryEnglish:
1. Sakura has to adjust to Dokuro, her killings, his classmates wailing on him, and trying to keep his sanity in the pilot. 

2. Sakura meets Sabato where she and Dokuro finally explain why they have been sent to assassinate him.

2.TitleEnglish: Cupid of Love! Dokuro-chan! / New Cinema Paradise! Dokuro-chan!
2.SummaryEnglish:
3. Sakura and Shizuki help Miyamoto have a get together with his secret admirer. 

4. Sakura and Shizuki go to the movies for a date, but things go awry when Dokuro follows and when Sabato remakes an appearance.

3.TitleEnglish: Field Trip! Dokuro-chan! / Test of Courage! Dokuro-chan!
3.SummaryEnglish:
5. The class goes on a camping trip where Sakura tries to impress Shizuki, but tries not to be killed by Dokuro for various reasons. 

6. The class goes on a test of courage through a dark forest to reach a mountain peak. With Shizuki getting lost in the forest, Sakura tries to search for her.

4.SummaryEnglish:
7. Sakura meets Zakuro where she explains that she needs to take Dokuro back to the future. 

8. Sakura is left with a choice if he wants Dokuro to stay with him or not.

1.TitleEnglish: Sketching Event! Dokuro-chan! / Bubbles and Scrubbing Battle! Dokuro-chan!
1.SummaryEnglish:
Sakura, Dokuro and Shizuki are on a school trip where they are asked to draw the scenery, but not without Dokuro harassing him most of the time.

After Dokuro and Zakuro are scared of a "monster" they read about in a myth book, they then want (and force) Sakura to join them in the bath.

2.TitleEnglish: Accidents Happen in Closed Spaces! Dokuro-chan! / Valentine's Day Kiss! Dokuro-chan!
2.SummaryEnglish:
Sabato's mother informs everyone that Sabato has to return to the future, but Sakura tries to stop her from leaving, thus everyone ends up in a prison cell. Many attempts to escape go very wrong.

Dokuro makes Sakura chocolate, shaped of himself, for Valentine's Day. However, she adds a special "binkan sausage" which makes Sakura really "special" and also gives him an allergic reaction. Zansu, Dokuro, and Zakuro then try to help him overcome the allergy, but all are unknown to the fact that Zansu may have a bigger goal in mind.
